briefTitle: Utility and Work Productivity Data for Economic Evaluation of Breast Cancer Therapies in the Netherlands and Sweden
officialTitle: Utility and Work Productivity Data for Economic Evaluation of Breast Cancer Therapies in the Netherlands and Sweden
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Health utility: is a measure of strength of preference that people have for particular health states. A year in full health is arbitrarily assigned a value of 1: a state that is considered equivalent to death is assigned a value of zero
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Age \> 18

Exclusion Criteria:

N/A
